text: The following is a list of Teen Choice Award winners and nominees for Choice Music - Rock Song. It was first introduced as Choice Music - Rock Track in 2001 before being retitled in 2012. It was retitled to Choice Music - Rock/Alternative Song in 2018. Paramore receives the most wins with 4. ==Winners and nominees== ===2000s=== {|class="wikitable" width=70% !Year !Winner !Nominees !Ref. |- |align="center"|2001 |"Jaded" – Aerosmith | *"Butterfly" –
